code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var appSlice=createSlice({name:"app",initialState:{channelId:null,channelName:null},reducers:{setChannelInfo:function setChannelInfo(state,action){state.channelId=action.payload.channelId;state.channelName=action.payload.channelName;}}});var setChannelInfo=appSlice.actions.setChannelInfo;export{setChannelInfo};export var selectChannelId=function selectChannelId(state){return state.app.channelId;};export var selectChannelName=function selectChannelName(state){return state.app.channelName;};export default appSlice.reducer;
